project.description: Build a 10-story residential apartment complex in suburban area. Budget: $15M. Timeline: 24 months. Must include 100 units, parking for 150 cars, community center, and landscaping. Must comply with local zoning laws and building codes.

bids.scope: Complete 10-story building with 100 units, underground parking for 150 cars, 2000 sq ft community center, full landscaping including trees and walkways, all permits and utilities included, LEED certification
10-story building, 100 units, parking garage, community space, basic landscaping
